name: i18n-at-monorepo
description: Type-safe internationalization toolkit for React with IDE code jumping support

scripts.docs:deploy: npm run docs:build && npx wrangler pages deploy docs/.vitepress/dist --project-name=i18n-at-docs
scripts.docs:preview: npm run docs:build && npx wrangler pages deploy docs/.vitepress/dist --project-name=i18n-at-docs --env=preview
